channel.title: Stairs

item.title: Stairs
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

case 1722: if (c.heightLevel == 0) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.absX, c.absY + 4, 1); } else if (c.heightLevel == 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.absX, c.absY + 4, 2); } break; case 1723: if (c.heightLevel == 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.absX, c.absY - 4, 0); } else if (c.heightLevel == 2) { c.getPA().movePlayer(c.absX, c.absY - 4, 1); } break;

Ok the 1722 works but the 1723 doesn’t. Basically What it’s doing is if they want to go up one set of stairs then they go up a height and move 4 spaces to the North. It works when going upstairs but when it’s going downstairs it doesn’t work.

Any help?

Read full topic
